Value: Persons with a disability, difficulty or long-term condition
en: Persons with a disability, difficulty or long-term condition
fr: Personnes ayant une incapacité, une difficulté ou un problème de santé de longue durée

en: Persons without a disability, difficulty or long-term condition

en: Total, persons with and without a disability, difficulty or long-term condition
